item.title: Who am I?
item.description: Software developer with more than 12+ years of experience; I have had the opportunity to work in almost all spectre of an application: mobile, web & back-end. Most of the time I have spent has been in back-end projects where C# and .Net technologies have been my specialities. Also I have performed as tech lead for small and multi-region teams with different seniorities, always looking to increase the potential of each member and to reach the team’s goals.
